item.description:
Janene has organized this event. Thanks Janene!

Please join us at Moksa, next to Central Square Theatre, at their Asian Fusion bar for animated conversation with old friends and new acquaintances. Complimentary light     hors d\’oeuvres provided by Sitz.

Getting there and Parking:

Public Transportation
Take the MBTA Red Line to Central Square. Walk towards the Charles River – few blocks up on right hand side Mass Ave.
There are several bus routes within two blocks of the theater.
Visit the MBTA for more info.
Green Street Garage – 260 Green Street
The garage entrance is on the corner of Green Street and Pearl Street.
Parking is $1.50 an hour.

Street Parking – after 6 pm for most areas no need to feed meters, however, please check.
http://moksarestaurant.com/
(617) 661-4900

 

Please respect the RSVP rules! (RSVP only if you plan to attend)
item.name: Our only afterwork in December!
